website_summaries.verdict: This dish heater has the added advantages of a remote control and an oscillating function.
pros: Heat that does not dry out
Projects a cone of heat rather than blowing
cons: Heater doesn't seem to push heat as far as some other models

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money and bad customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this heater in 2016 and it didn’t last the year. It died almost as soon as we bought it and we had to do a reset. We put it away for the summer and when we used it again, it lasted a few hours and died again. This time the reset failed. I haven’t been able to contact customer service. The phone number on their website just rings. It’s going into the dumpster and I’ll never do business with this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Horgan

customer_reviews.title: It worked well for about a month. Then it ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for about a month. Then it starting shutting off more nd more frequently. Now after four months it will heat for maybe ten minutes, then trips itself off and cools for 5 or 6 minutes. Still under warrantee but it will cost half of the purchase price to return it when you include their 15.00 fee they charge for handling. Frustrating. I may wait a month and catch the sales on a more reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Jones

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage. Stopped working literally after 5 minutes of working
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Stopped working literally after 5 minutes of working. I used it once and it worked at night. I threw the boxes in the recycle bin which was picked up the next morning. I turned the heater on the next day and no go. No heater, no oscillation. Nothing. Piece of junk that I can’t reurn. GARBAGE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: clange

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this heater November of 2018 and it only lasted until January 2019 even though it was only used occasionally. Just heat for 30 minutes then shuts off. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Young Cow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keep mother warm
customer_reviews.text: When my mother came to live with us I bought this to keep her warm. It's great that it can focus the heat on her and not be blowing hot air around since my husband likes a cool room. We like the fact that it has a thermostat and can turn itself on/off. The first one we ordered had a defective remote control, but the company exchanged it without any problems. I read other reviews where people had problems but I decided to chance it and buy one since I liked the features of this. We have been using this for four months now without issues. The remote control is so nice to have too.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Overheats too fast
customer_reviews.text: After having it for a only a few weeks we couldn't use the "high heat" option because it would over heat too quickly so we only use it on low... And now after 2 months, it overheats after 3-5 minutes and shuts off. Loved the oscillating option and remote, but of it won't stay on, so we have to wait for it to cool, press the reset button, and start over again.
customer_reviews.author: FrankieJohnny

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought after a recommendation from a friend. It keeps turning off!!!!! AND it didn’t come with the correct screw to secure the heater to the rotating base. Complete waste of money DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up. My husband set it up in less than 5min. Works perfectly. Goes all the way up to 98 degrees. And it comes with batteries for the remote control. Great indoors and outdoors. Highly recommended! 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Maleah

customer_reviews.title: Total waste
customer_reviews.text: Item does not work at all, got a replacement, it worked for 2 days and that was it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: warm and toasty
customer_reviews.text: This is the second oscillating pedestal digital dish heater with remote that I have used. The heater keeps a 12 by 12 ft room both warm and toasty when the furnace is turned down low. The first one that I owned worked great for 2 winters but then the oscillating unit broke into 2 pieces, so keep the box as there is a warranty. The warranty had expired when my unit broke so I do not know how that process works.
customer_reviews.author: lucy1895

customer_reviews.title: Was good for 4 days then broke.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! but, after a week I heard a pop and it broke! However, amazon's customer service department was very receptive and immediately sent me a new one! (I returned the broken one). I've had the new one for a couple of weeks now and it's great! It's true what they say... it doesn't dry up the air in your room and has a natural feeling of heat. The other room-heaters used feel stuffy and I used to wake up to a dry mouth. This one perfectly regulates the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The heater worked for a couple of months on high now it doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: Great design-must have for large warehouse counter service workers!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We work close to a door that opens frequently in a very large space..bbbbrrrrrr in the winter. This heater had to be designed with our type of situation in mind!!! Our area is about 19' x 8' in a much larger space and we sit at a counter most of the day. My coworkers have been raving over this heater!! We were wary about the bad reviews, but really needed a heater that sat up higher...and so, took a chance. Sooooo glad we did. It has been running at least 10 hours a day for two months now and not a single issue. I think the oscillation is incredible and we are going to purchase more!!!
customer_reviews.author: hud

customer_reviews.title: Works and Provides only Moderate Heat
customer_reviews.text: It puts out moderate heat, definitely LESS than our dish that we bought from COSTCO about 8 years ago. I bought it thinking that it being on a pedestal, would direct the heat better when we are watching TV in the family den. Disappointed with the output, and the height level is too low for it to be truly effective. If they added another tube (section) and lengthened it, this could be a great little heater. Then, I would buy another 2.
customer_reviews.author: islandboy9000

customer_reviews.title: My elderly parents LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 74 year old mother and she loved it...my dad borrowed it from her one evening when he was cold and refused to give it back so I had to order mom another one LOL! It is wonderful...both my parents now enjoy them
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Elevated Heat Dish Design Is Effective
customer_reviews.text: Good size and efficiently warms up a medium sized room quickly. Quiet operation and the elevated height of the heat dish makes it far more effective. The only shortcoming preventing me from giving it a 5 star rating is that it does not come with a remote control.
customer_reviews.author: SYJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't think twice...get 2
customer_reviews.text: Get model that telescopes w adjustable pole stand..couldnt find it in any store seems like an online only model.... dont use it inside but probably safe...I bring it when when not in use.. got white model... rotating feature hits head to toe stretch out on outside furniture , bring dish about 4 feet away , on rotate and fall asleep.. Air stays Cold outside its perimeter but within the dish heat radius, which is plenty, of reach , it heats up an area to 88 degrees during a 40 - 50 degree night...theres' a thermometer to see temp of heat radiant. if that makes sense...
customer_reviews.author: On the beach in St Monica,

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money------6  bad Units
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through 6 of these in less than a year. Thankfully I was able to exchange most of them through Amazon as most of them stopped working within 30 days. All of them have had the same issue...the caution light comes on and they will not turn back on. The first one I ran on high but the last 5 I only ran on low. It costs more to ship the unit to be repaired than I originally paid for it. Apparently this issue has been going on for years and has never been resolved. Don't waste your money look for a better unit through another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Great heater! I have 2!
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 of these heaters for over 3 years. They both still work and I am considering purchasing a 3rd. The only funny thing is that sometimes my TV remote will turn the heater on or off. I dont understand the negative reviews. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LukeStation

customer_reviews.title: Great heater
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these years ago and it still works so bought another one. It quit working after a few uses and they sent me another one immediately. We love these heaters. Love that they are on a stand and not the floor
customer_reviews.author: Rene Warner

customer_reviews.title: Buy Something Else
customer_reviews.text: While I really liked this heater, it only worked for about 3 weeks. There’s an over-heat protection that makes a little button pop out on the back. After using the heater for less than 5 minutes, the button would just continuously pop out. I decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie P.

customer_reviews.title: Nope.  Not the one.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but breaks. First the night setting went about a month after having it. This lived in my garage to keep it warm and stayed in one spot. Still broke. It would work for 2 minutes and then kick off and need to be reset. So I worked on the low setting for another couple months. Now it trips and kicks off after two minutes. Oscillating feature worked sporadically at best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PURE JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Did not last even 30 days. Overheated, shut down, wouldn't stay on, oscillating feature wouldn't resume when it came back on. I still have one of the older model H4500 and it has never failed me. When Amazon connected me to the tech support they were no help and left me with the feeling that they couldn't have cared less.
customer_reviews.author: M. Falat

customer_reviews.title: Not a high heat heater, but okay if very close.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t put out as much heat as past parabolic heaters, but does work as promised. Good value for price.
customer_reviews.author: P. dowie

customer_reviews.title: Optimus Heater - Number One in the Market (second to none) and can never by rivaled.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Optimus H-4501 14 inch that I have purchased. Everything about it is beautiful. It oscillates with a remote control; it stands like a standing fan; it is handy and very easy to carry from place to place; it stands firmly on the floor and does not tip over like other heaters that I know. I saw it first time in my doctor's office and I fell in love with it. I have recommended it to a lot of my friends who like it very much but consider the price to be on the high side. However, will buy more as and when needed. Wonderful product! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Topsy Uyokpeyi

customer_reviews.title: 2 hot
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has a safety feature Once it’s to hit it cuts off
customer_reviews.author: La

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Junk, safety breaker pops anytime the hi setting is used.
customer_reviews.author: R. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Horrible buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heater because I have a different model for almost 3 years now that works great. But this model is horrible it only works for about 5 min and then it turns off (overheat) so I can't turn it on again for about an hour. I returned it once and had it replaced to have the same problem again. I will not recommend to anyone waste of money
customer_reviews.author: mayra

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!!! Lol
customer_reviews.text: Just stopped working... figures it was a refurb so u get what you pay for. In this case it was still over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Jess V.

customer_reviews.title: Not something you want to buy if you're going to use it often
customer_reviews.text: The product worked well for about 2 weeks and then began to automatically shut off due to overheating. Now we constantly have to reset it or hit the button on the top to make it stay on for a day or two and then it goes right back to overheating. Not a product that's worth the money
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: This thing is trash
customer_reviews.text: This heater is trash, bought one and the safety switch on top kept tripping everytime I turned it on, sent it back for a replacement thinking it was just defective. The second one worked great untill my return window closed, now it's behaving the same way and I can't return it...thanks a lot Chris.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Unit looked like somebody else rejected it and the source just sent it to me.
customer_reviews.text: Unit did not work. I had to send it back and get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Smith

customer_reviews.title: Trust the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Trust the reviews. This thing worked great for maybe two weeks. I heard a pop & it stopped working completely. For the amount of money it costs, it should last years.. not weeks. So many reviews said this but I chose not to listen n give it a chance.. NEVER AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Mattison Evans

customer_reviews.title: Optimus green house heater
customer_reviews.text: Pushed 5 Stars by mistake, product burned up. Follow directions, Plugged it in, Started smoking and wouldn’t stop. Totally useless product!
customer_reviews.author: Tina K.

customer_reviews.title: A nice heater that keeps you warm!
customer_reviews.text: While this doesn't heat up quickly, it does a great job of warming up the room and keeping it warm. It has a thermostat that appears to be accurate and works well. It was not hard to assemble and came well packaged. I highly recommend it, thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Gay N.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: It broke after a week of having it.. The thermostat broke and wouldnt stay on for longer than 10 minutes before tripping the thermostat. Also i thought it had a fan but didnt just the top spins. This item is way to over priced.
customer_reviews.author: martin d saterstad

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product so I returned it. I bought this heater so that I could sit on my deck in the evening and enjoy the outdoors. It doesn’t give out sufficient heat, or warm an area at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love all mine,I have 4,now,after my last purchase,this month...I'll buy again...price is great, down $30,I hope to purchase one more,all of mine are all in good working condition,my first purchase was like 7/8 ago
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Henry

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: piece of garbage. can even put on low shuts off in less than 10 minutes! will never buy it again. very very bad product.!!!!! very pissed off i am!
customer_reviews.author: rodrigo f garcia

customer_reviews.title: This heater is great for small areas but not for a big room
customer_reviews.text: This heater is great for small areas but not for a big room. It works well and keeps the room warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rho

customer_reviews.title: While this is a better option in my opinion for outdoor heating than my ...
customer_reviews.text: While this is a better option in my opinion for outdoor heating than my previous review, the photo is very misleading as the center core is the only part that heats up and projects the heat. It is not as the picture depicts the entire circle heating and projecting the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Can't be left on overnight
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my parents when their furnace went out in the middle of freezing weather and they had been told it would be at least a week for parts. They said it worked well but can not be placed near anything or left ttended, They said the instructions said to not leave on over night. Defeated the purpose of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RP in TX

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. It provides instant heat to a cold person. The heat projects out from the dish as advertised. It will warm up a small room without any problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jack S.

customer_reviews.title: Heater
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the type I had that finally "played out". Satisfied with quality and it heats family room without having to keep the expensive furnace running all the time and it actually did not cause my power to jump too high. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love the timer options. Heater does get the room heated quickly. The remote control could be a bt bigger with more options.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA M LOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We have burn oil for heat this helps keep oil bill down
customer_reviews.author: Linda Price

customer_reviews.title: Cuts off
customer_reviews.text: When it gets hot it cuts off ,push the reset button runs for 2 minutes and cuts off again. I want my money back. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Vines

customer_reviews.title: looks good, still rotates but no heat
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE Iused this heater for mother in law bedroom, worked okay, until the return window closed. then promptly failed. looks good, still rotates but no heat. this unit is junk don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice while it lasts..
customer_reviews.text: Works great! For about 3 months, then fizzles out and quits all together. Not worth the price and the return window is very small. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethF

customer_reviews.title: Like the older version better
customer_reviews.text: The older version has lasted us nearly 10 years and we love it. This one not so much. It seems like it kicks off in overheat mode like every time we run it.
customer_reviews.author: Sayari

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Nope. Unit shuts off when on high. Will be returning. This unit does not function properly.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this heater!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this heater!! We have 3 of them in all & I ordered one for my best friend too! She saw it at our home & loved it!! My friend in Hawaii wants one but seller won't ship to Hawaii! :(
customer_reviews.author: B J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Warms Nicely!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Love the temperature control. And the timer. Warms up the room nicely!! Bought one for mom too.
customer_reviews.author: RICK

customer_reviews.title: I do not like having problems with a new item.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the fact that it has not worked properly after being in use for about 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: feedback
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!! I looked for one last year and didnt find one. a friend told me to look on you all website and it was there and cheaper than another cataloge and sam's. My lightbill will be cheaper cause i will use it in my total electric home. Yes i will recommend you all to everyone...Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: tbird22

customer_reviews.title: Unable to contact customer service for warentee!!
customer_reviews.text: After one season, it only lasts 2min. on high. The overheat function turns the heater off. Unable to contact warentee dept.
customer_reviews.author: omit

customer_reviews.title: Nice and toasty
customer_reviews.text: It's quite and distributes heat pretty evenly in a large room.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Although we haven't had it for 6 months, it's no longer turning, so we may return it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bethseine Hedgman

customer_reviews.title: Continuously shut off
customer_reviews.text: This heater, shut off continuously due poor design. I would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Bad thermostat..not recommended. I will contact manufacturer for reimbursement or replacement and hopefully the resolve the issue..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t heat very well. Ca t feel it unless ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t heat very well. Ca t feel it unless you are directly in front of it. Really unhappy. My floor heater produces more heat then this.
customer_reviews.author: juan j vasquez salazar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item almost whisper quiet and has a tremendous impact on my overall electric bill.
customer_reviews.author: NooN

customer_reviews.title: This heater works intermittently. It shuts off as soon ...
customer_reviews.text: This heater works intermittently. It shuts off as soon as it heats up. I ordered this one because I gave away my other one, which was exactly the same, and it didn't function improperly as this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price; safety switch trips to shut it off when set on "high"
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace a parabolic heater of the sealed element type (think glass brooder lamp). I couldn't find one of those but this one had even higher wattage (800-1200 watts). It uses regular resistance coils wrapped around a cone rather than a sealed beam element in a heat resistant glass envelope. After a few weeks of use, it started to trip the safety switch when set on high wattage. Not as sharply focused as the sealed element predecessor so user sets it higher to compensate. Using it closer at 800 watts so it doesn't trip the safety switch. Oscillates and remote control are good features that work well. Probably wouldn't buy again because of performance issues listed above.
customer_reviews.author: Byron R. Winchell

customer_reviews.title: I need the leg and the remote control.
customer_reviews.text: My replacement didn’t have the leg and the remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Had 2 that gave me malfunction light
customer_reviews.text: The heating was good and wordked fine until two weeks when the malfunction light came on it can not be reset you have to return it per the manufacter.
customer_reviews.author: bennie

customer_reviews.title: Works good, except when on HI it turns off after ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good, except when on HI it turns off after a few minutes. This is a good feature but seems to turn off to soon, I actually thought it had a fan but does not. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol DiFlauro

customer_reviews.title: Replaced by Amazon- Was satisfied with Amazon
customer_reviews.text: First heater was missing two parts and would not turn on. Replaced by Amazon- Was satisfied with Amazon. Second heater was missing column between base and heater. Called company and they said would send me replacement. This company needs to really work on their inspections and quality control.. Two orders and two screw ups. Turned on the second heater and doesn't seem to put out much heat. When and if I get the replacement part will know better. Not holding my breath with their past history.
customer_reviews.author: John A Knox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the temperature in the bedroom , where it has been set. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Lillie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable heat and thermostat but gets a little noisy after a year of usage.
customer_reviews.author: yeebee

customer_reviews.title: He loved it and was very happy with the warmth it ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband received one as a Christmas gift about 5 years ago for use in his shed during the winter months. He loved it and was very happy with the warmth it provided. We also used it on many occasions in the house instead of lighting up the fireplace; again we were very pleased. Unfortunately, one night we had it on and the wire shorted out and caught on fire. We were very lucky to be in the same room or it could have been a disaster. It was a very scary and troubling circumstance. We decided to purchase another one because we truly liked its performance, but will never trust leaving the room while its plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: The shipping box was perfect the product box inside was very old tattered and looked to have been previously returned.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken :( has nothing to do with the quality of the product. However, this does happen often when ordering large electronic over the mail.
customer_reviews.author: maricela zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Works fine just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect just what we were looking for. The only complaint that I have is that some of our Samsung TV remote control functions are on the same frequency as the Optimus remote. Our info button on the TV remote turns down the temperature on the Optimus.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Oscillating feature spreads the heat out nicely. A nice supplement to a bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient and effective. Heats up a 800 sq ft room in no time. Not made for much bigger. Oscillating feature spreads the heat out nicely. A nice supplement to a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: My package came to me in bad shape, and when I opened it
customer_reviews.text: My package came to me in bad shape, and when I opened it, the extension pole is missing so I am unable to set it in the stand, as well as the remote
customer_reviews.author: katherine roth

customer_reviews.title: Nice Heater!
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. It has nice features and very sturdy. Good for heating small room. A bit dissapointed with the height, but it does the job..
customer_reviews.author: Budget Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works very good easy to move and set good heat as needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Because of that I'm super disappointed. I wish the description was more clear ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specifically for newborn photography because it said you can tilt the head. I was hoping to be able to tip it down slightly but sadly it "tilts" just a tiny bit either pointing straight forward or a tiny bit up. It won't tilt down even slightly. Because of that I'm super disappointed. I wish the description was more clear that it only has two tilt settings. It puts out ok heat but only at that specific height and only straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: this heater works great at heating our bedroom and I feel comfortable with the safety aspects of it. I use it often and without worry.
customer_reviews.author: marybeth brissette

customer_reviews.title: great to be warm again
customer_reviews.text: best heater ever!.. had bought one many years ago ,hard to find ...but amazon had it and so greatful ..its like having a fireplace in the room!
customer_reviews.author: guy lyons

customer_reviews.title: Optimus H-4501 14-Inch Oscillitating Pedestal Digital Dish Heater with...
customer_reviews.text: Like the unit. specially the rotation. My expectation was a higher heat, but again it is 14" unit. Remote is a good thing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Humble life

customer_reviews.title: good performance with convenient interface
customer_reviews.text: it is suitable for keeping me warm during sleeping on my bed at night. its long neck makes me happy in the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kyungbae Kwon

customer_reviews.title: The directions don't give you a crucial bit of information regarding assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I returned mine because I didn't realize (and they didn't say in the instructions) that when you put the heater on the pipe base, there is a key slot and bump you have to align. If you don't align them, the oscillation doesn't work properly. So points off for poor directions. I found out the truth on the next one that came as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Hazel

customer_reviews.title: it turns off after coming on for like one
customer_reviews.text: really small, and does not force out enough heat. If used in the house, it turns off after coming on for like one minute
customer_reviews.author: Londyn Vickers

customer_reviews.title: Great small room heater!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second heater same model, my first still works great even though it is over 2 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Max

customer_reviews.title: great for room heating
customer_reviews.text: we have had this heater in our home for over a year and it is the best room heater we have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Nona Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: This heater is wonderful! I am disabled and it has every convenience ...
customer_reviews.text: This heater is wonderful! I am disabled and it has every convenience that I need.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew N. Lewis III

customer_reviews.title: optimus heater
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. It has met mt expectations. The automatic turn off when it over it over heats.
customer_reviews.author: locke

customer_reviews.title: NO REGRETS
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. It really heats up the room well and the great thing about it you can set the timer and the temperature so that it works automatically . This oscillating digital heater is highly recommended by me as a must have in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this heater for about a month now. Loved it...and then the power started cutting out; first it just stopped in the middle of heating. I thought it might have to do with the temp settings; then it got really, really hot at the cord to unit connection and quit working. Now I'm scared to fire it up due to fire possibility. Don't buy it! Save your home...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good heater for the money
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why, but for some reason I assumed that it would be more like a fan and would "push" the heat towards me. Overall, it heats up very quickly and does a good job. If you are using this in a room that is always cold, I suggest turning it on about 10 minutes before you plan to go in the room to stay there. It is a little bit louder than the heater I previously had, but overall, a good heater for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Howes

customer_reviews.title: Read!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well but just so you know it doesn't blow heat at all its just like one of those propane heaters with the top head , does not blow heat just oscilate....
customer_reviews.author: hailey

customer_reviews.title: Does not produce good heat
customer_reviews.text: I will be retuning this. It does not produce good heat at all. It won't do you any good to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Fire hasard
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine in Dec. 2016 I have used less than 6 months. The cord at the controls has gotten so hot that it fried itself where it goes in. This machine is a fire hazard and should be recalled. I don't recommend buying one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heater Died after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that this heater died, does not turn on, 4 months of use this winter. Which just happens to be out of the return window. I was using it lightly everyday during these winter months. I should have bought a radiator heater!
customer_reviews.author: Chenoa Durheim

customer_reviews.title: very low build quality
customer_reviews.text: the heat dish came broken, from the warehouse, the back plate was extremely flimsy in quality, not a buy for sure
customer_reviews.author: prachi

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Every 2 to 3 minutes of use circuit ...
customer_reviews.text: Issues with circuit breaker planning to return. Not happy. Every 2 to 3 minutes of use circuit breaks and have to wait for 10 minutes or do for reset.
customer_reviews.author: PRADEEP SHAH

customer_reviews.title: Believe the Real reviews
customer_reviews.text: Learned my Lesson. DO NOT BUY. the reviews are right. Unit started tripping at High heat setting after the 30th day after purchase. my luck, not easy return. It works fine in low heat setting. due to small dish head, heat at low power barely puts anything out. so far it oscillates fine, with loud irritating noise. Not worth to oscillate. LISTEN to the People. in high heat, after about 5-10 minutes, it pops. will not turn on until it cools down. also, the remote sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Sal M

customer_reviews.title: Expect a disposable heater and you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: To clarify, I've used the heater for almost 3 months and it's been great. However it started to fail like a lot of the other reviews mentioned. It started turning off and lighting up the caution light. I called up their support # and you will need to ship this thing (or at least the upper part) out to california with a 2-3 weeks turnaround. So in other words expect this heater to fail quickly (and often - as some of the other reviews have mentioned). If you want it fixed, do expect to pay shipping and a quite long turnaround time as well.
customer_reviews.author: lz

customer_reviews.title: Great overall; Will update if it breaks
customer_reviews.text: So far it's great. Way better than the Presto thing. And I'm not paid by either of them and I didn't get either for free in exchange for a favorable rating; I'm interest-free. Edit: This heater does not emit nearly as much heat as the Presto. Pretty disappointing. Edit2: After about an hour or two of use, it shut off automatically with the "Caution" light on. Impressive. 1.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sam
